warranty: 4 Year on Movement; 2 years on the rest of the watch.
case crystal: Nearly Scratch Proof Sapphire 2.5mm Thick with Beveled Edge
crown: Screw Down, Signed with Aquacy Logo
bezel: 120 click Uni-Directional Rotating;  Ship Porthole Design with Luminous @ 12; Coin Edge on Bezel
dial markers: Applied Steel in Rise Gold Tone to Match Case; Aquacy Hei Matau Logo As the 12-Marker with Full Lume
strap/band material: Italian Leather Embossed with Alligator Pattern
clasp: Tang Buckle; Brushed Stainless Steel in Rose Gold Tone with Aquacy Logo
